channel.title: The 42nd Street Drive-In
channel.description: The 42nd Street Drive-In is a podcast devoted to the Grindhouse/Drive-In movies of the late 60's through the early 80's. Join hosts Shawn Hunt & Christopher Kahler as they celebrate and even poke fun at classic (and not so classic) B-movies from such diverse sub genres as: Asian Cinema, Blaxploitation, Cannibal films, Car-sploitation, Giallo, Nazi-sploitation, Oz-sploitation, Slasher films, Spaghetti Westerns, Splatter films & Zombie films. Each episode offers up an insightful, informative and humorous look at two different films released during the heyday of the Grindhouse era. Can you dig it ?
channel.itunes:subtitle: The 42nd Street Drive-In is a podcast devoted to the Grindhouse/Drive-In movies of the late 60's through the early 80's. Can you dig it ?
channel.itunes:summary: The 42nd Street Drive-In is a podcast devoted to the Grindhouse/Drive-In movies of the late 60's through the early 80's. Join hosts Shawn Hunt & Christopher Kahler as they celebrate and even poke fun at classic (and not so classic) B-movies from such diverse sub genres as: Asian Cinema, Blaxploitation, Cannibal films, Car-sploitation, Giallo, Nazi-sploitation, Oz-sploitation, Slasher films, Spaghetti Westerns, Splatter films & Zombie films. Each episode offers up an insightful, informative and humorous look at two different films released during the heyday of the Grindhouse era. Can you dig it ?
channel.itunes:author: Shawn Hunt & Christopher Kahler
channel.itunes:keywords: blaxploitation, naziploitation, sexploitatioin, grindhouse, kung fu, carsploitation, women in prison, ozploitation, shocksploitation, zombies, cannibals

item.title: Episode 14: 'Bloodsucking Freaks' & 'The Sinful Dwarf'
item.description: Shawn & Chris enter the world of 'dwarfsploitation' with two of the seediest little people on film with guest hosts Steven A. Grainger and Paul McVay from Drive-In of The Damned. Can you dig it ?
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 14: 'Bloodsucking Freaks' & 'The Sinful Dwarf'
item.itunes:summary: Shawn & Chris enter the world of 'dwarfsploitation' with two of the seediest little people on film with guest hosts Steven A. Grainger and Paul McVay from Drive-In of The Damned. Can you dig it ?
item.itunes:author: Shawn Hunt & Christopher Kahler

item.title: Episode 13: 'Blood Beach' & 'The Boogens'
item.description: Shawn & Chris cover some early 80s out-of-print monster movies with guest hosts Patrick from Scream Queenz, & Vaughn from Motion Picture Massacre. Can you dig it ?
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 13: 'Blood Beach' & 'The Boogens'
item.itunes:summary: Shawn & Chris cover some early 80s out-of-print monster movies with guest hosts Patrick from Scream Queenz, & Vaughn from Motion Picture Massacre. Can you dig it ?
item.itunes:author: Shawn Hunt & Christopher Kahler

item.title: Episode 12: 'Chained Heat' & 'Women In Cages'
item.description: Shawn & Chris visit the not-so-friendly confines in their first women in prison episode with 'Chained Heat' & Women In Cages' with guest hosts Steven A. Grainger and El Goro. Can you dig it ?
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 12: 'Chained Heat' & 'Women In Cages'
item.itunes:summary: Shawn & Chris visit the not-so-friendly confines in their first women in prison episode with 'Chained Heat' & Women In Cages' with guest hosts Steven A. Grainger and El Goro. Can you dig it ?
item.itunes:author: Shawn Hunt & Christopher Kahler

item.title: Episode 11: 'Burial Ground: Nights of Terror' & Nightmare City'
item.description: Shawn & Chris have an emergency "so-bad-it's-good" zombie episode after Chris recently saw 'Burial Ground' for the first time and throws their entire show schedule off in the process. 'Nightmare City' gets dragged in as the companion movie. Special guests Andy Copp & El Goro join in for the fun. Can you dig it ?
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 11: 'Burial Ground: Nights of Terror' & Nightmare City'
item.itunes:summary: Shawn & Chris have an emergency "so-bad-it's-good" zombie episode after Chris recently saw 'Burial Ground' for the first time and throws their entire show schedule off in the process. 'Nightmare City' gets dragged in as the companion movie. Special guests Andy Copp & El Goro join in for the fun. Can you dig it ?
item.itunes:author: Shawn Hunt & Christopher Kahler

item.title: Episode 10: 'Tombs of The Blind Dead', Return of The Evil Dead', 'The Ghost Galleon', & 'Night of The Seagulls'
item.description: Shawn & Chris celebrate their 10th episode with a bonus sized Dusk Til Dawn show covering Amando de Ossorio's 'Blind Dead' movie series with guest hosts Patrick from Scream Queenz, El Goro from Talk Without Rhythm, & Paul McVay from Drive-In of The Damned Radio. Featuring editing by Michael Fralin. Can you dig it ?
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 10: 'Tombs of The Blind Dead', Return of The Evil Dead', 'The Ghost Galleon', & 'Night of The Seagulls'
item.itunes:summary: Shawn & Chris celebrate their 10th episode with a bonus sized Dusk Til Dawn show covering Amando de Ossorio's 'Blind Dead' movie series with guest hosts Patrick from Scream Queenz, El Goro from Talk Without Rhythm, & Paul McVay from Drive-In of The Damned Radio. Featuring editing by Michael Fralin. Can you dig it ?
item.itunes:author: Shawn Hunt & Christopher Kahler

item.title: Episode 9: 'The Bird with The Crystal Plumage' & 'The Black Belly of The Tarantula'
item.description: Shawn & Chris jump into the giallo sub genre with special guests Vaughn from Motion Picture Massacre and Patrick from Scream Queenz with the usual results in Italian name pronunciation. Can you dig it ?

item.title: Episode 8: 'The 36th Chamber of Shaolin' & 'Master of The Flying Guillotine'
item.description: Shawn and Chris go east to cover kung fu films '36th Chamber of Shaolin' with guest host El Goro and 'Master of The Flying Guillotine' with Vaughn. Can you dig it ?

item.title: Episode 7: 'Zombie' & 'Zombie Holocaust'
item.description: Shawn and Chris cover the Lucio Fulci classic 'Zombie' with guest host Andy Copp and the not-so-classic 'Zombie Holocaust' with El Goro from Talk Without Rhythm. Can you dig it ?
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 7: 'Zombie' & 'Zombie Holocaust'

item.title: Episode 6: 'Faster, Pussycat ! Kill ! Kill !' & 'Bad Girls Go to Hell'
item.description: Do pussycats go to hell faster than bad girls ? Find out in this episode when Shawn & Chris cover the Russ Meyer classic 'Faster, Pussycat ! Kill ! Kill !' with special guest Andrew Shearer and 'Doris Wishman's 'Bad Girls Go to Hell' with 3 time defending guest host Steven A. Grainger. Can you dig it ?
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 6: 'Faster, Pussycat ! Kill ! Kill !' & 'Bad Girls Go to Hell'

item.itunes:author: Shawn Hunt & Christopher Kahler

item.title: Episode 5: 'Frogs' & 'Food of The Gods'
item.description: Shawn & Chris get attacked by the animal kingdom ! Steven A. Grainger jumps in once again for 'Frogs' and Patrick from Scream Queenz returns for 'The Food of The Gods'. Can you dig it ?
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 5: 'Frogs' & 'Food of The Gods'

item.title: Episode 4: 'Dolemite' & 'The Human Tornado'
item.description: Shawn & Chris venture into the blaxploitation genre with 2 of their favs from Rudy Ray Moore ! Steven A. Grainger joins them for 'Dolemite' and Vaughn from Motion Picture Massacre swings by for 'The Human Tornado'. Can you dig it ?

item.title: Episode 3: 'Cannibal Holocaust' & 'Cannibal Ferox'
item.description: The holocaust is upon Shawn and Chris as they cover 'Cannibal Holocaust' with Andy Copp and 'Cannibal Ferox' with Vaughn.

item.title: Episode 2: 'Pink Flamingos' & 'Female Trouble'
item.description: Shawn and Chris cover a John Waters shocksploitation double feature with special guests Andrew Shearer for 'Pink Flamingos' & and Patrick for 'Female Trouble'
item.author: 42ndstreetdrivein@gmail.com (Shawn Hunt & Christopher Kahler)

item.title: Episode 1: 'Last House on The Left' & 'Last House on Dead End Street'
item.description: Shawn and Chris kick off their premiere show with guest hosts Steven A. Grainger for a look 'The Last House on the Left' and Andy Copp for 'Last House on Dead End Street'. Can you dig it ?
